message.body: How are you?
I'm good. It's been crazy here in boston though. How are you?
I'm fine. I read about what happened and wanted to see how you were

Yeah it's pretty tragic. Things got really scary there for a hot minute. But All the "authorities" are being super cautious so I feel really safe. I heard there were helicopters in Philly and shit cause of it
It's so horrible mi didn't hear about anything in Philly.
I think the general consensus here is what the fuck
And get em!
However people on the street yesterday were super nice and supportive it was so cool to see.
Lots of runners that had of hadn't finished walking around
I'm happy to hear that people were being supportive too. It seems like things like that can bring out the worst violent reactions in people
ï¿¼Check out these paintings my housemate got from an artist squat that was getting evicted. Each panel is 3 feet wide and 9 feet tall.
That's sick!!!!!
Dam makes me miss Philly
The paint is super thick and there's broken glass embedded in it
Yep. That's Cris. We had a lot of fun hanging them together.
Yeah the paint looks thick in the picture
Is that your roommate?
Dude did you see the wheelchair picture from the bombings ? I just keep thinking how sad it is
How'd you hang them
We used french cleats because they're real heavy and painted on some kind of particle board covered with canvas.
Which picture?
The 27 year old who lost both his legs. In the wheelchair
It's being posted everywhere
It's sad
I just saw it. That's really sad
Yeah
So where'd those paintings come from
I'm also planning to come visit Philly in may
Ill prob stay for a week

They were in a warehouse on Lancaster ave. There were artists living there for like 30 years and they got evicted. There were a lot of really big pieces of art. But I think they found homes for all the art.
I'd love to see you when you're in Philly
Oh yeah definitely! Ill let you know when I'm there.... Sorry fell asleep last night
I can't hardly wait! That's fine. I fell asleep soon after.
Yeah Wednesdays I have to be at school at 8 am. So early. I hate it.
That is real early. I'm supposed to be at work at 8 but I'm late almost every day
Where do u work? In west Philly
8 is so early. Especially cause I usually have class until nine thirty Tuesday thru Thursday
No. In northern liberties. It's like a 20 minute bike ride.
It only takes you twenty minutes that's fast! You take spring garden?
Where at?
What's the place called?
I take spring garden. It's called Greensaw Design & Build. You should look at our website and facebooks
Oh wow that's quick
I'm a little closer than penn because I'm further north. I don't ride fast.
I could never get my commute from fishtown to penn down to twenty minutes
Always thirty
How do you get around Boston? Did you get a new bike?
No I don't have a bike yet. I use my feet!! The reality is that I don't go as many places. Which is sad. I hate not being mobile
Ill buy a bike in Philly and bike back to boston !!
Ha. That's a long ride.
Mike do u have a fancy touch screen iPhone?
Yes. I do have a space phone
Why do you ask?
I dunno it said I was I messaging with u but I couldn't imagine u with an iPhone.
I just got one for school
And I think about my phone a lot
I use it all the time
I'm making work about it.... How it constantly needs me, it really doesn't like to be lonely.

It is really weird. I wouldn't have imagined myself with one. I was due for an upgrade so it was relatively cheap. I don't really need it. I just use it for silly stuff like word games and listening to music at work
Yeah. I use it for podcasts! When I walk to school I love to listen to the moth or selected shorts. I get my stories in. But I have to take pictures and videos for school so the iPhone is great.

Mike this is really upsetting but I haven't known who to ask about this. I just saw (on facebook) this morning that Sarah Dekker died a year ago. Did u know about that? What happened? I feel embarrassed asking Matt because I didn't know earlier. And that girl was special really one of a kind. I'm kind of in shock.

I didn't know. I saw your Facebook post earlier but didn't realize who it was. You shouldn't feel embarrassed about asking Matt about it. It's not weird for someone to hear about something like that after the fact
Yeah. I dunno. Isn't that really sad
I dunno how to feel
It is really sad. I'm sure you knew her better than I did.
Yeah we worked together stretching screens one summer
And I was such a heavy smoker ...
Did you quit smoking?
I don't buy them anymore
Unless I'm drinking
In Philly
I wish I could say yes
I've been playing the same game. My friend Matt calls them party cigarettes.
Yeah
Well I had to cut back when I lived with my parents but man it can escalate quickly out if control
It's tough. I've been pretty good lately. But whenever I hang out with someone who smokes I wind up bumming cigarettes from them.
Yeah I don't know many people who smoke anymore
Makes it easier
But I realized that smoking affects me mentally as we'll as physically. When I'm smoking a lot I get depressed
I've noticed less sm
Less smokers in my life too. I don't know if less people are smoking in general or if we're just getting older...
Yeah both I'd say. So do u go out In northern Philly ?
Like all those bars that I miss but will never return to like: el bar, Johnny Brenda's, cantina, KGf, bobs happy hour

Not too much. My sister lives in fishtown so I'll meet her for dinner around there once in a while. Or sometimes people from work go to ortliebs for happy hour. But usually if I go out I stay in west Philly: dahlak, Fiume, Pasquallly's, dock street, etc.
Aww dahlias
Dahlak!
Me and Ingrid got offered money there in January
That sounds like a good story. By whom? What happened? What did you say?

Ok so we were working on one if her papers reading away. When first this drunk younger guy with dreds came up to us and was like " what u drinking?" But it was hard to understand him and eventually he disappeared. About twenty minutes later the guy comes back with his buddy. this guy was older and he looked like he had his teeth kicked out front the inside, like his teeth were parallel with the floor. He leans in "next time I offer to buy you drinks you accept." We tried to explain that we had not realized that he was trying to buy us drinks

And thAt we were leaving, but he pulled out a big wad of cash like HUGE wad and starts throwing twenties on the table. . I'm like what fuck yes pocket that shit. Ingrid, more level headed than me is like no no no. Anyway he tried to get us to come back to his club with him. I think I've mentioned gojo or something Anyway me and booked it outta there. And that's the end of the story
Yeah it took me all day to write that, typos and all
That's sounds kinda scary. Dahlak is like a magnet for weirdos. My friend Melissa had her purse stolen recently when a bunch of us were there for her birthday.
It was kind of scary but what was scarier was that I was tempted to take the money and run!
I was ready. Ingrid had to push my hand away.
Hahahhaa
ï¿¼Look at this tiny painting. It's only like 2 inches by 3 inches
Ritz
My friend David showed me that. He bought it from his friend.
To boston under lockdown. U following this? It's crazyï¿¼
What's going on there? I haven't heard anything since early this morning. About how someone shot a security guard and then the police killed one suspect
Yeah the whole city is on lockdown
It's crazy the "bombers" ambushed a cop
Killed him, then stole a car and held up a seven eleven
That was last night
National guard came in
Tons of cops.
All out manhunt
They shot a killed one of them
The other still on the run
It's so crazy. How are you dealing with it all? Do you feel less safe?
I feel fine. Its just weird. I think I'm just a little sad.
This is the longest movie ever
Longest movie ever? What is?
Boston bomber media coverage
They got him though
Did they say anything about who he is?
Yeah
They released who they are
They are young
He's 19
Its awful that there are people who think they have a right to hurt other people. Did they say anything about why they did it?
No
He was alive. But my sister just texted to me that's he's dead. She knows some high up cop or something
News reporting he's in a boat
Covered in blood
Manhunt since midnight last night
It's so crazy. And keeps getting crazier
Wahoo! He's alive!
That's good. I just read something about them. It sounds like they had hard lives. It said they were refugees from Chechnya.
I dunno
Hey, do you have a place to stay when you come to Philly?
I have a few places to stay. Nothing set in stone though.
Well you're more than welcome to come stay on the farm with me and cris for all or part of your visit.
The horses are dying to meet you
I wanna meet the horses
I think that sounds like fun.
Cool. We also have lots of beds and couches. We even have a bathroom. With a shower and everything.
Yeah I'm going to probably be spending most of my time with Ingrid in the suburbs. But Amelia's got an extra room in south Philly and I got my old roommates in fishtown.
I really wanna come to Philly. I miss it. But I'm so proud of boston.
After yesterday
I have a wood working question ...
Fire away.

Ok so I'm trying to make this little box (remember I don't work with wood). So I'm going to laser cut 1/4inch ply wood. And do some finger joints (is that Wat it's called ) with some wood glue. I just wasn't sure how to finger out the size of the notches ill be cutting away in the wood
ï¿¼This is my hot glued and taped together prototype it's gonna host my arduino and they'll be some light sensors that make noises
I'm pretty clueless. Just as clueless with whole as I am with the code
I have this beautiful cherry but its too thick to laser cut :(ï¿¼
If its too dfficult to explain don't worry I'll figure this shit out. I have no doubt ill get it in the end!
If you know someone with acress to a thickness planer they can plane the cherry down thin enough that you can laser cut it
The spacing should be easy to figure out in autocad? I don't know I've only ever done it with a tablesaw
I mean structurally
If I have .25 inch wood is their some sort of ideal notch length?
Ya know like should I avoid taking out corners if its a vertical piece
Also I'm trying to put a shelf in there... I should just go home for a day and do it with my dad
Like I just know nothing
I'm making it at half an inch now in illustrator
At least then ill be able to get to Home Depot
Any tips?
I don't think I have time to butter up the wood shop into helping me out
It sucks massart is like a big suck up game.
I'm complaining sorry. I'll get it.
The computer is helping me
Sorry I'm not responding. I'm visiting my parents. I'll text you in a little bit when I get home.
It would be easier to explain in person. But the length doesn't matter. It's just an aesthetic decision. Are the finger joints just where the sides meet or where the sides join the top as well?
Also the number of fingers won't affect the strength of the joint because even just a few of them gives you a lot of glue surface
I just trying to figure out if I can do one cut for two edges
ï¿¼
That looks like it might work because then you're just folding it. But I don't know how much material the laser cutter removes. You might wind up with gaps where it cut.
Yeah that's what I think if I separate though Ill still end up with gaps right ?
I don't know much about laser cutters. I'm just picturing when you cut something with a saw you have to account for the thickness of the blade
Yeah laser too
Ehhh well ill try it
Do you have extra wood? See what happens. Maybe the gap will be small enough that it won't be noticeable.
I don't have extra wood that's the problem. But I'll have to get more
ï¿¼So I cut it once and it didn't go through so I'm Doing it again. It's gonna look like shit but at least ill have something to work with
Good luck. Let me know if you have anymore questions. Also I want to see the final product!
ï¿¼Box!!!
Now for the cover
What can I use to fill in the gaps???
Wood glue?
Cool! It looks good. What's going inside? I didn't understand what you wrote before
An arduino and some light sensors
It's going to play music
It's going to play cell phone ringtones
What's an arduino?
ï¿¼
If you have some sandpaper sand some of your scraps to make some dust and mix it with the glue to make a paste. When it dries the color will be close to the color of the wood
Or just put glue in the gaps and sand the box
The dust will mix with the glue by itself
So is the arduino a tiny radio?
No a kind of computer
Like a little not computer
Oh I get it
It's like a radio
It will be plugged into my laptop
I'm going to re cut the wood
I shouldbe able to send u a vid of some of the code tonight give me a few hours
You're going to remake it? Why? It looked good in the picture
Cause I'm going to change the design of it
ï¿¼
I changed my mind about something. I'm do silly.
But it's too fun!!!
But some kid is on the laser now until late so boo.
Just stare at him and make him real uncfortable.
Aww I'm so excited about this box! I'm so happy to get off the laptop.
No that's mean he is making really cool etched fish. And is kind of fat
And he is white with dreds
Plus I have other stuff to work on. Grad school is so fun. Have you decided to apply to that program here?
I finished the application. Just waiting to hear back.
Oh shit. Cool.
That looks rad. Are people supposed to look in the holes in the top?
People will put their fingers on it like a flute or something and it will play sounds
The sounds are really annoying old cellphone ringtones. Depending on where your finger is in relation to the hole the sound will come on, turn off, pitch will go up, or pitch will go down
That's really cool. It's like an instrument?
Yeah!
You're awesome. That seems so complicated.
No I'm not awesome. I made a couple shitty boxes but don't even know how to begin with the code. It's a joke.
So instead I'm writing a little manifesto to go along with it
Hahaha
The boxes look good. And the idea is awesome. I still think you're really brilliant. I was always so impressed with your work when we were at penn.
Well that is quite a compliment. Def loved ur work as well. Remember when u showed me those old magazines. That was awesome. I made the popular guy!! The kkk rally and the wolf prints!!! Oh so fun!
Anyway just wish I could figure out how to make some money.
Then ill really be smart
But money alludes me, therefore I must marry rich or remain a failure.

Fuck that. If you're doing what you love you're not a failure. I decided a while ago that when I'm old I want to be able to look back at my life and see things I made that I'm proud of. Not compromises I made for the sake of a comfortable life.
Yeah. U right.
But I want little babies someday and those cost money!
I am woman. Hear me roar. Haha.
Yeah. Babies are expensive. But a lot of my friends have babies now and they're just as poor as me. They make it work.
My only actual friend with babies has super rich parents. She thinks everything gonna be dandy cause her man goes to Cornell.

But honestly mike it's do funny. I was like just doing my thing when it struck and I was like I need health benefits because someday I wanna have little babies. Me and Ingrid both got hit at the same time. It was like well drinking two dollar beers ain't gonna cut it anymore
I understand that. You're growing up. I never thought I'd want to be that settled. But lately all my friends are buying houses and having kids. And I'm feeling that
Yeah. I also really want a dog. And I live in a really nice apartment and I don't day drink. Nor do I accept Harley Davidson not rides from the guy who owns the laundry mat. I'm officially grow up
That's good to hear. I've thought about getting a dog. But my cat wouldn't let me
What kind of dog you want to get?
Some kind of mutt. Something not too large either.
Yeah I really want one. I need to finish school first
A west Philly brown dog.
Any dog that's part pitbull. They come in all different colors. Not just brown. But even the white ones are sort of brown.
Haha what's that look like?
iPinkyswear
I have a secret
Don't tell anyone
Ok don't really like pitbulls
Shhh
I will lie to pitbulls ownerS
I have lived with and loved pitbull mixes
I think the small ones are supercute
How come you don't like them?
Cute but not super cuddly
I don't know... I hung out with two cute and cuddly pit mixes recently. I know they're not all like that. They're also super neurotic.
I guess it depends
I'm not trying to give you a hard time about not liking pitbulls.
You're giving me such a hard time mike! Goddam. It's not like I am spearheading a mass genocide of pitbulls!!
Haha. I was genuinely curious why you don't like them. But I like teasing you.
Teasing over text messaging!
Just playfully.
